Card.Name: Haywire Mite
Card.RulesText: When Haywire Mite dies, you gain 2 life. {G}, Sacrifice Haywire Mite: Exile target noncreature artifact or noncreature enchantment.

Card.Name: Young Wolf
Card.RulesText: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Card.Name: Twinblade Slasher
Card.RulesText: Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) {1}{G}: Twinblade Slasher gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

Card.Name: Ulvenwald Tracker
Card.RulesText: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

Card.Name: Noble Hierarch
Card.RulesText: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

Card.Name: Stonecoil Serpent
Card.RulesText: Reach, trample, protection from multicolored Stonecoil Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

Card.Name: Bayou Groff
Card.RulesText: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.

Card.Name: Scavenging Ooze
Card.RulesText: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

Card.Name: Steel Leaf Champion
Card.RulesText: Steel Leaf Champion can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Card.Name: Questing Beast
Card.RulesText: Vigilance, deathtouch, haste Questing Beast can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Combat damage that would be dealt by creatures you control can't be prevented. Whenever Questing Beast deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to target planeswalker that player controls.

Card.Name: Rancor
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Fallow Earth
Card.RulesText: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

Card.Name: Shadowspear
Green Sun's Zenith
Card.RulesText: Search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

Card.Name: Green Sun's Twilight
Card.RulesText: Reveal the top X plus one cards of your library. Choose a creature card and/or a land card from among them. Put those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If X is 5 or more, instead put the chosen cards onto the battlefield or into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Card.Name: Winter's Grasp
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land.

Card.Name: Skysovereign, Consul Flagship
Card.RulesText: Flying Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

Card.Name: Invoke the Ancients
Card.RulesText: Create two 4/5 green Spirit creature tokens. For each of them, put your choice of a vigilance counter, a reach counter, or a trample counter on it.

Card.Name: Gaea's Cradle
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

Card.Name: Khalni Garden
Card.RulesText: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Maze of Ith
Card.RulesText: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
